protein.specific_function: May be involved in calcium-dependent ubiquitination and subsequent proteosomal degradation of target proteins. Probably serves as a molecular bridge in ubiquitin E3 complexes. Participates in the ubiquitin-mediated degradation of beta-catenin (CTNNB1)
